component.text: not enough characters entered for the IOS to recognize the command
not all of the required keywords or arguments were entered
command was entered incorrectly. The error occurred where the caret mark (^) appears.

Reenter the command followed by a question mark (?) with no space between the command and the question mark.
The possible keywords that you can enter with the command are displayed.
Reenter the command followed by a question mark (?) with a space after last word. The required keywords or arguments are displayed.
Reenter the command followed by a question mark (?) in a place pointed by '^' mark. It can be also needed to delete last keyword(s) or argument(s).
